headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Medtronic (MDT) After Mixed Long Term Share Returns
summary: If you are wondering whether Medtronic is fairly priced right now or quietly offering value, this article walks through what the current market price might be telling you. The stock last closed at US$96.86, with an 11.1% return over the past year, a 27.9% return over three years and a 3.8% decline over five years, which gives mixed signals about how investors have been viewing its prospects. Recent headlines for Medtronic have focused on the business as a major medical technology player in...
